solution.text:
Perimeter of the square plot \(=_{{4*j}}_\,m\)
We know, perimeter of a square plot \(=4 \times side\).
\(\Rightarrow 4 \times side = _{{4*j}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow side=_{j}_\,m\)

content.text:
The perimeter of a square plot is \(_{{4*j}}_\) m.
What is the length of one side of the plot?
